Heading: Metadata contact
Note: For queries and feedback concerning the metadata record itself

Heading: Accessibility request contact
Note: Eg for requests for supply of mutable digital files for conversion to other formats

Heading: Promotional contact
Note: Eg for requests relating to interviews, author events

Heading: Review copy contact
Note: Eg for requests for review copies

Heading: Evaluation copy contact
Note: Eg for requests for approval or evaluation copies (particularly within education)

Heading: Permissions contact
Note: Eg for requests to reproduce or repurpose parts of the publication

Heading: Return authorisation contact
Note: Eg for use where authorisation must be gained from the publisher rather than the distributor or wholesaler
